aciklama: During my internship, I developed a website using ReactJS, next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
A project that explores the process of blurring artificial intelligence, presented as a university term paper. I developed the front-end of this website using Django.

We are collaborating on a Twitch chatbot that utilizes Node.js and the Axios library to access the Riot Games API. The chatbot aims to furnish Twitch viewers with up-to-date in-game data for both 'League of Legends' and 'Teamfight Tactics' matches.
